cleaned_text: Image 1 of Endless Possibilities Aromatherapy Spray from $15.00 Endless Possibilities Aromatherapy Spray is made for meditation, manifestation, and stress relief. Made with an essential oil blend of rosewood, spruce, lavender, lemongrass, sweet orange, peppermint and LOVE. Spray liberally before you meditate, on your pillow before bed, or in your car or office. It will refresh your mind and uplift your spirit.
